inclusion.criterion: Suspected pulmonary tuberculosis with acid-fast bacilli in a stained smear of expectorated or induced sputum.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Karnofsky score of at least 60 (requires occasional assistance but is able to care for most of his/her needs; see Appendix B).
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Women with child-bearing potential must agree to practice an adequate (barrier) method of birth control or to abstain from heterosexual intercourse during study therapy.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Laboratory parameters done at, or <14 days prior to, screening: Serum amino aspartate transferase (AST) activity ≤ 3 times the upper limit of normal
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Laboratory parameters done at, or <14 days prior to, screening: Serum total bilirubin level ≤ 2.5 times the upper limit of normal
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Laboratory parameters done at, or <14 days prior to, screening: Serum creatinine level ≤ 2 times the upper limit of normal
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Laboratory parameters done at, or <14 days prior to, screening: Complete blood count with hemoglobin level of at least 7.0 g/dL
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Laboratory parameters done at, or <14 days prior to, screening: Complete blood count with platelet count of at least 50,000/mm3
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Laboratory parameters done at, or <14 days prior to, screening: Serum potassium > 3.5 meq/L
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Will be discontinued from the study, but followed for 14 days to detect late toxicities from study therapy.
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Known intolerance to any of the study drugs
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Current or planned therapy during the intensive phase of therapy using drugs having unacceptable interactions with rifampin (rifabutin can be substituted for rifampin during the continuation phase of therapy).
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has suspected pulmonary tuberculosis and meets most inclusion criteria. However, they have a history of prolonged QT syndrome which is an exclusion criterion.
